original_title: The Absolute Truth About Pro Wrestling
overview: A new documentary about the strange and sometimes secretive world of pro wrestling, both inside and outside the squared circle.  For six years, Mark Ezovski followed three individuals to explore the strange, fascinating and secretive world of professional wrestling.  The Absolute Truth About Pro Wrestling is not a film about wrestling but a film about three individuals following their dreams. It is a funny, sad and ultimately uplifting portrait of life outside of the squared circle.
title: The Absolute Truth About Pro Wrestling
